raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added feature flag (`dependabot-conda-support.yml`) enabling Conda support for Dependabot in GHES >3.19 and cloud versions
- Updated package manager tables in documentation to include Conda with `conda` YAML value
- Documented Conda support limitations: no private registries, vendoring, or lock file updates
- Added version-specific conditional rendering for Conda entries
